sentences.en: Dr. Ramsay looked from one to the other with perplexity.
sentences.cn: 拉姆齐医生困惑不解地朝她俩逐一望望.
祖母茫然不解地朝四处望望.

sentences.en: He began counting them and then, with growing perplexity, counted them a second time.
sentences.cn: 他开始数，然后更加困惑，于是又数了一遍。

sentences.en: He scratched his head in perplexity.

sentences.cn: 她越来越焦虑和不知所措.

sentences.en: His face , never easily controlled by him, expressed all the perplexity and disturbance which he felt.
sentences.cn: 他从来不善于掩饰自己的脸色.这会儿, 他心里感到的种种困惑和烦恼都在脸上呈现出来.

sentences.en: I pondered a moment in sore perplexity.
sentences.cn: 我思虑片刻,一时不得其解.

sentences.en: It was now his turn to look about in perplexity.
sentences.cn: 现在轮到他莫名其妙地四处张望了.

sentences.en: Most of them just stared at her in perplexity.
sentences.cn: 他们多数人茫然地凝视着她。

sentences.en: Robert outfaces his perplexity with his most peremptory air.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特尽量以专横神气来掩饰窘迫.

sentences.en: She looked at us in some perplexity.
sentences.cn: 她有点困惑不解地看着我们.

sentences.en: She must have seen my perplexity.
sentences.cn: 她一定看出我有些迷惑不解.

sentences.en: They regarded the appointment with some perplexity.
sentences.cn: 他们对于这项任命在某种程度上感到无所适从.

sentences.en: This put me to extreme perplexity.
Yale shook his head in a gesture of perplexity.
sentences.cn: 耶尔带着惶惑不解的神情,摇了摇头.

words.tran_cn: 复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的
使困惑，使为难；使复杂化

trans.tran_en: the feeling of being confused or worried by something you cannot understand
